dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.ra.kpi.RevenueAssuranceKPI
dataStructure.description:
A measure of a specific aspect of the Revenue Assurance performance of an entity, such as a CustomerBill or CallDetailRecord, defined on a RevenueAssuranceViolation that may trigger the creation of a RevenueAssuranceTroubleTicket.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: RevenueAssuranceKPI

child.name: revenueAssuranceControl
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association RevenueAssuranceControlMayBeUsedAs

This association end is optional
child.label: revenueAssuranceControl
